text: Eric Louis Zinterhofer (born August 1971) is an American private equity financier, and a founding partner of Searchlight Capital Partners. ==Early life== Eric Zinterhofer was born in August 1971. He is the son of Dr Louis J. M. Zinterhofer and Susan A. Zinterhofer of Rumson, New Jersey. He earned a bachelor's degree from the University of Pennsylvania. ==Career== Searchlight Capital was established in 2010 by Zinterhofer, Oliver Haarmann, and Erol Uzumeri, its founding partners. ==Personal life== In June 1996, Zinterhofer married billionaire heiress Aerin Lauder, the daughter of Ronald Lauder in his home at Wainscott, Long Island, New York, with Rabbi Peter J. Rubinstein presiding. They have two sons. They live in New York City and have homes in Easthampton, New York, and Aspen, Colorado. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:University of Pennsylvania alumni Category:American financiers Category:Lauder family
